DOC.brief_summary: There increase evidence psychosocial factor may affect health mean biological effect change behavioral health . Observational study suggest association low level one long chain n-3 fatty acid , DHA ( docosahexaenoic acid ) , pregnancy occurrence postpartum depression ( PPD ) . This observational cohort 4 wave follow-up nested clinical trial pregnant woman reside city Rio de Janeiro . The general objective describe magnitude identify factor associate common mental disorder ( CMD ) pregnancy postpartum give emphasis maternal nutritional status . Main specific objective : 1 . To evaluate effect CMD pattern occurrence select maternal child outcome ( inadequacy gestational weight gain , postpartum weight retention , low birthweight , small gestational weight prematurity ) , consider effect determinant factor , 2 . To evaluate effectiveness daily omega-3 dos ( fish oil ) preventing PPD .
DOC.brief_title: Nutritional Status Mental Health During Pregnancy Postpartum : Cohort Study Rio de Janeiro , Brazil
DOC.detailed_description: The protocol predict CMD map monitor nutritional status throughout pregnancy postpartum . Women interview four time point : 1 . First trimester : 8th 13th ( baseline ) , 2 . Second trimester : 22nd-24th gestational week , 3 . Third trimester : 34th-36th gestational week , 4 . Postpartum : 30-45 day The following information gather : 1 . Common mental disorder ( CMD ) : MINI International Neuropsychiatric Interview , symptom depression ( Edinburgh scale - EPDS ) , anxiety ( Trait Anxiety Inventory - TAI ) 2 . Dietary intake ( food frequency questionnaire ) 3 . Anthropometric measure ( stature body weight ) physical activity 4 . Biochemicals : fasting glucose , lipid profile ( total cholesterol , HDL-c , LDL-c ) , serum fatty acid composition , inflammatory marker ( C-reactive protein , interleukin-6 ) , hormone ( adiponectin , insulin , leptin ) . All woman follow throughout pregnancy constitute observational cohort . In second trimester , woman identify risk PPD [ past history depression ( DSM-IV ) present score depression ( Edinburgh scale ) > = 9 baseline interview ] invite participate clinical trial . These woman randomly allocate two group : Intervention 1 : Fish oil : [ 1,8 g/dia n-3 ( 1,08 g EPA e 0,72 g DHA ) + vit E ( 0,2 mg/g ) Intervention 2 : Placebo comparator : soybean oil + 1 % fish oil + vit E ( 0,2 mg/g ) The supplementation occur 22nd-24th week pregnancy 16 week .
DOC.criteria: age 20 40 13 week pregnancy free chronic infectious disease ( except obesity ) reside study catchment area twin pregnancy
